post.author: 김성욱

comment.author: 김중수
comment.content: 삼성것과 컴팩은 개인적(?)으로 비추입니다. 그래픽카드가 온보드형태라..한번 고장나면 전체를 갈아야 하구요..삼성은 노트북사업을 접을것으로 되어 있기도 하고..컴팩은 단가 낮추려 싸구려 부품을 쓰는것 같음. 또 묘하게 삼성과 컴팩이 그래픽보드가 잘 나가더라구요..

post.content:
It's been 8 years my laptop and it's quite old. I'm looking for quite a decent once for some development work, lightweight, longer battery life, reasonable price, good quality for movie watch, etc.
What would you recommend? I look for Dell at the moment, but guess there must be other good makes.
post.title: Looking for recommendation/guideline for laptop purchase
